Legal (8.5 x 14 in) Letter (8.5 x 11 in) Label (4 x 6 in) 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Make sure the Print Service Plugin for yor printer is installed. Enable bluetooth or Wifi connection on your printer. When selecting "Print receipt" after accepting payment, replace "Save as PDF" with "All printers", and search for new printer. Pair and connect the printer to your mobile when prompted. Adjust paper size as needed, and select "Print" when ready to print the receipt. If printing is not available, you can always save your receipt as PDF and send it by email to print it from another device. If you are experiencing issues printing from your device, contact customer support for your printer. Print with your device Label format options 1 2 3 4 5 Make sure your printer and your device are connected to the same WiFi networks After selecting \"Print shipping label\", you may have to select and add a printer if you haven\'t printed from this device before. You can select your device\'s default print service or install your printer\'s brand app (this should appear as a recommended option) You might have to configure WiFi printing directly on the printer itself. Make sure the printer firmware is updated and see your printer documentation for instructions. If you are still experiencing issues printing from your device, you can save your label as PDF and send it by email to print it from another device. Label images older than 180 days are deleted by our technology partners for general security and data privacy concerns. Try to refund manually Tap To Pay Test Payment Test Tap To Pay payment was successfully refunded View Order Learn more about accepting payments with Tap To Pay on Android About Tap To Pay What is Tap to Pay? Tap to Pay lets you accept all types of contactless payments – from physical debit and credit cards, to digital wallets – without the need to purchase a physical card reader. Important information In %1$s, some cards require a PIN for contactless transactions above %2$s. We do not support PIN entry with Tap to Pay on Android. To accept payments above this limit, consider purchasing a card reader that accepts PIN entry. Learn more about card readers How it works 1. Create an order 2. Tap “Collect Payment” and choose “Tap to Pay”. 3. Present your phone to the customer. 4. Your customer holds their card horizontally at the top of your phone, over the contactless symbol. 5. After you see the “Done” checkmark, your store will process the payment, and the transaction will be complete. The Contactless Symbol is a trademark owned by and used with permission of EMVCo, LLC. Tap To Pay Securely accept contactless payments directly from your phone. Card Reader Card reader accepts tap, chip, and swipe payments with debit and credit cards.
